mapper.insert: insert into emotion (diary_id, member_id, emotion_type, emotion_time, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by) values (#{diaryId}, #{memberId}, #{emotionType}, TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'HH24'), CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, '감정 생성', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, '감정 생성')
mapper.select: select emotion_id, diary_id, member_id, emotion_type, emotion_time from emotion where emotion_id = (select max(emotion_id) from emotion)
mapper.update: update emotion set emotion_type=#{updateParam.emotionType}, emotion_time=TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'HH24'), updated_at=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updated_by='감정 수정' where diary_id = #{diaryId}
mapper.select: select emotion_id, diary_id, member_id, emotion_type, emotion_time from emotion where diary_id = #{diaryId} and is_public = 'Y'

select TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(d.write_date, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMM') AS month, TRUNC(AVG(CASE WHEN e.emotion_type = '기쁨' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100, 0) || '%' AS 기쁨, TRUNC(AVG(CASE WHEN e.emotion_type = '희망' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100, 0) || '%' AS 희망, TRUNC(AVG(CASE WHEN e.emotion_type = '중립' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100, 0) || '%' AS 중립, TRUNC(AVG(CASE WHEN e.emotion_type = '슬픔' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100, 0) || '%' AS 슬픔, TRUNC(AVG(CASE WHEN e.emotion_type = '분노' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100, 0) || '%' AS 분노, TRUNC(AVG(CASE WHEN e.emotion_type = '불안' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100, 0) || '%' AS 불안, TRUNC(AVG(CASE WHEN e.emotion_type = '피곤' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100, 0) || '%' AS 피곤, TRUNC(AVG(CASE WHEN e.emotion_type = '후회' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100, 0) || '%' AS 후회 from diary d LEFT JOIN emotion e ON d.diary_id = e.diary_id where d.member_id = #{memberId} and d.is_public = 'Y' and TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(d.write_date, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMM') = #{month} group by TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(d.write_date, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMM')

select e.emotion_type, COUNT(e.emotion_type) AS count from diary d LEFT JOIN emotion e ON d.diary_id = e.diary_id where d.member_id = #{memberId} and d.is_public = 'Y' and TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(d.write_date, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMM') = #{month} group by e.emotion_type order by count DESC FETCH FIRST 3 ROWS ONLY

select EMOTION_TYPE, EMOTION_TIME, COUNT from ( select e.emotion_type AS EMOTION_TYPE, e.emotion_time AS EMOTION_TIME, COUNT(e.emotion_time) AS COUNT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY e.emotion_time ORDER BY COUNT(e.emotion_time) DESC) AS RN from diary d LEFT JOIN emotion e ON d.diary_id = e.diary_id where d.member_id = #{memberId} AND d.is_public = 'Y' AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(d.write_date, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMM') = #{month} group by e.emotion_type, e.emotion_time ) sub where RN = 1 order by EMOTION_TIME ASC
